responsibilities: Build strong relationships with analytically technical end users and help them maximize their use of Hex during evaluations.
Work with Hex end users throughout the sales cycle, including discovery, product demos, trials, and proofs of concept.
Partner with Account Executives to develop opportunity-level strategy, execute evaluations, and share feedback.
Source and synthesize critical product feedback from prospects to share with internal Engineering & Product teams.
Project manage architecture, security, and technical reviews required by prospects.
Develop content to support users in evaluations, such as demo projects, documentation, and videos.
Travel to customer on-sites and marketing events to deliver demos and build strong customer relationships as needed.
skills: Familiarity with data science tooling and workflows, including Python, SQL, and BI tools.
Excellent communication skills to build empathy, share feedback, and grow successful relationships.
Generalist technical skillset with a passion and interest in technology and creative problem-solving.
Strong track record of talking to customers and solving their problems.
qualifications: 4+ years experience in a technical Pre-Sales role.
Experience or interest in working in an early-stage startup environment.
Location preference for the East Coast, with New York preferred.
